trans-unit.source: na
trans-unit.target: na

trans-unit.source: Install ATA
trans-unit.target: 安装 ATA

trans-unit.source: The following are the steps required to get ATA deployed, configured, and running.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取 ATA 部署、 配置，并且正在运行所需的步骤如下。

trans-unit.source: To configure ATA, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要配置 ATA，请按照下列步骤 ︰

trans-unit.source: Preinstallation steps
trans-unit.target: 预安装步骤

trans-unit.source: Step 1.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 1。

trans-unit.source: Download and Install the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: 下载并安装 ATA 中心

trans-unit.source: Step 3.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 3。

trans-unit.source: Configure ATA Gateway Domain Connectivity Settings
trans-unit.target: 配置 ATA 网关域的连接设置

trans-unit.source: Step 4.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 4。

trans-unit.source: Download the ATA Gateway Setup Package
trans-unit.target: 下载 ATA 网关安装包

trans-unit.source: Step 5.
trans-unit.target: 第 5 步。

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway installation
trans-unit.target: ATA 网关安装

trans-unit.source: Step 6.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 6。

trans-unit.source: Configure the ATA Gateway settings
trans-unit.target: 配置 ATA 网关设置

trans-unit.source: Step 7.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 7。

trans-unit.source: Configure VPN Subnets and Honeytoken user
trans-unit.target: 配置 VPN 子网和蜜标的用户

trans-unit.source: Pre-installation steps
trans-unit.target: 安装前步骤

trans-unit.source: If you installed the ATA public preview version, see [ATA Release Notes](./small.md) for help uninstalling the ATA Preview version.
trans-unit.target: 如果您安装 ATA 公共预览版本，请参阅 [ATA 发行说明](./small.md) 有关卸载 ATA 预览版本的帮助。

trans-unit.source: Install KB2934520 on the ATA Center server and on the ATA Gateway servers before beginning installation, otherwise the ATA installation will install this update and will require a restart in the middle of the ATA installation.
trans-unit.target: ATA 中心服务器上安装 KB2934520 并在开始安装前 ATA 网关服务器上，否则为 ATA 安装将安装此更新需要中间 ATA 安装重新启动。

trans-unit.source: Step 1.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 1。

trans-unit.source: Download and Install the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: 下载并安装 ATA 中心

trans-unit.source: After you have verified that the server meets the requirements, you can proceed with the installation of the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: 验证服务器满足要求后，您可以继续进行 ATA 中心安装。

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps on the ATA Center server.
trans-unit.target: ATA 中心服务器上执行以下步骤。

trans-unit.source: Download ATA from the [TechNet Evaluation Center](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/evalcenter/).
trans-unit.target: 下载从 ATA [TechNet 评估中心](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/evalcenter/)。

trans-unit.source: Log in with a user who is a member of the local administrators group.
trans-unit.target: 登录的用户是本地管理员组的成员。

trans-unit.source: From an elevated command prompt, run Microsoft ATA Center Setup.EXE and follow the setup wizard.
trans-unit.target: 从提升的命令提示符处，运行 Microsoft ATA 中心 Setup.EXE 并按照安装向导。

trans-unit.source: On the **Welcome** page, select your language and click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: 在 **欢迎** 页上，选择您的语言，请单击 **下一步**。

trans-unit.source: Read the End User License Agreement and if you accept the terms, click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: 阅读最终用户许可协议，如果您接受这些条款，请单击 **下一步**。

trans-unit.source: On the **Center Configuration** page, enter the following information based on your environment:
trans-unit.target: 在 **中心配置** 页上，输入基于您的环境的以下信息 ︰

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Comments
trans-unit.target: 注释

trans-unit.source: Installation Path
trans-unit.target: 安装路径

trans-unit.source: This is the location where the ATA Center will be installed.
trans-unit.target: 这是将在其中安装 ATA 中心的位置。

trans-unit.source: By default this is %programfiles%\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，这是 %programfiles%\Microsoft 高级威胁 Analytics\Center

trans-unit.source: Leave the default value
trans-unit.target: 保留默认值

trans-unit.source: Database Data Path
trans-unit.target: 数据库数据路径

trans-unit.source: This is the location where the MongoDB database files will be located.
trans-unit.target: 这是 MongoDB 数据库文件将位于的位置。

trans-unit.source: By default this is %programfiles%\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center\MongoDB\bin\data
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，这是 %programfiles%\Microsoft 高级威胁 Analytics\Center\MongoDB\bin\data

trans-unit.source: Change the location to a place where you have room to grow based on your sizing.
trans-unit.target: 将位置更改为必须根据您调整大小的增长空间的位置。

trans-unit.source: Note:
trans-unit.target: 注意：

trans-unit.source: In production environments you should use a drive that has enough space based on capacity planning.
trans-unit.target: 在生产环境中应使用具有足够的空间根据容量规划的驱动器。

trans-unit.source: For large deployments the database should be on a separate physical disk.
trans-unit.target: 对于大型部署数据库应在单独的物理磁盘上。

trans-unit.source: See [ATA Capacity Planning](./small.md) for sizing information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 [ATA 容量规划](./small.md) 的大小调整的信息。

trans-unit.source: Database Journal Path
trans-unit.target: 数据库日志路径

trans-unit.source: This is the location where the database journal files will be located.
trans-unit.target: 这是数据库日志文件将位于的位置。

trans-unit.source: By default this is %programfiles%\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center\MongoDB\bin\data\journal
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，这是 %programfiles%\Microsoft 高级威胁 Analytics\Center\MongoDB\bin\data\journal

trans-unit.source: For large deployments, the Database Journal should be on a separate physical disk from the database and the system drive.
trans-unit.target: 对于大型部署，数据库日志应该位于单独的物理磁盘从数据库和系统驱动器上。

trans-unit.source: Change the location to a place where you have room for your Database Journal.
trans-unit.target: 将位置更改为一个位置，必须为您的数据库日志留出空间。

trans-unit.source: ATA Center Service IP address: Port
trans-unit.target: ATA 中心服务 IP 地址 ︰ 端口

trans-unit.source: This is the IP address that the ATA Center service will listen on for communication from the ATA Gateways.
trans-unit.target: 这是 ATA 中心服务将侦听来自 ATA 网关的通信的 IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: **Default port:** 443
Click the down arrow to select the IP address to be used by the ATA Center service.
trans-unit.target: 单击向下箭头选择 ATA 中心服务要使用的 IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: The IP address and port of the ATA Center service cannot be the same as the IP address and port of the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: IP 地址和端口的 ATA Center 服务不能为相同的 IP 地址和端口 ATA 控制台。

trans-unit.source: Make sure to change the port of the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: 请务必更改 ATA 控制台的端口。

trans-unit.source: ATA Center Service SSL Certificate
trans-unit.target: ATA 中心服务 SSL 证书

trans-unit.source: This is the certificate that will be used by the ATA Center service.
trans-unit.target: 这是 ATA 中心服务将使用的证书。

trans-unit.source: Click the key icon to select a certificate installed or check self-signed certificate when deploying in a lab environment.
trans-unit.target: 单击密钥图标以选择安装的证书或在实验室环境中部署时检查自签名的证书。

trans-unit.source: ATA Console IP address
trans-unit.target: ATA 控制台的 IP 地址

trans-unit.source: This is the IP address that will be used by IIS for the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: 这是为 ATA 控制台将由 IIS 使用的 IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: Click the down arrow to select the IP address used by the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: 单击向下箭头选择 ATA 控制台所用的 IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** Make a note of this IP address to make it easier to access the ATA Console from the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: **注意 ︰** 记下此 IP 地址来更轻松地从 ATA 网关访问 ATA 控制台。

trans-unit.source: ATA Console SSL certificate
trans-unit.target: ATA 控制台 SSL 证书

trans-unit.source: This is the certificate to be used by IIS.
trans-unit.target: 这是由 IIS 使用的证书。

trans-unit.source: Click the key icon to select a certificate installed or check self-signed certificate when deploying in a lab environment.
trans-unit.target: 单击密钥图标以选择安装的证书或在实验室环境中部署时检查自签名的证书。

trans-unit.source: Click **Install** to install ATA and its components and create the connection between the ATA Center and the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: 单击 **安装** 安装 ATA 及其组件并创建 ATA 中心和 ATA 控制台之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: When the installation completes, click **Launch** to connect to the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: 安装完成后，单击 **启动** 为连接到 ATA 控制台。

trans-unit.source: The following components are installed and configured during the installation of ATA Center:
trans-unit.target: 安装和 ATA 中心在安装期间配置以下组件 ︰

trans-unit.source: Internet Information Services (IIS)
trans-unit.target: Internet 信息服务 (IIS)

trans-unit.source: MongoDB
trans-unit.target: MongoDB

trans-unit.source: ATA Center service and ATA Console IIS site
trans-unit.target: ATA Center 服务和 ATA 控制台 IIS 网站

trans-unit.source: Custom Performance Monitor data collection set
trans-unit.target: 自定义性能监视器数据收集组

trans-unit.source: Self-signed certificates (if selected during the installation)
trans-unit.target: 自签名的证书 （如果在安装期间选择）

trans-unit.source: To help in troubleshooting and product enhancement, it is recommended that you install MongoVue and any other MongoDB add-in, or any other third-party tool of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 为了帮助进行故障排除和产品增强功能，建议您安装工具是 MongoVue 和任何其他 MongoDB 外接程序，或您选择的任何其他第三方工具。

trans-unit.source: MongoVue requires .Net Framework 3.5 to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 工具是 MongoVue 要求.Net Framework 3.5 安装。

trans-unit.source: Validate installation
trans-unit.target: 验证安装

trans-unit.source: Check to see that the Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Center service is running.
trans-unit.target: 检查以了解 Microsoft 高级威胁分析中心服务正在运行。

trans-unit.source: On the desktop click the Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics shortcut to connect to the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: 在桌面上单击 Microsoft 高级威胁分析快捷方式以连接到 ATA 控制台。

trans-unit.source: Log in with the same user credentials that you used to install the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: 登录相同的用户凭据用来安装 ATA 中心。

trans-unit.source: The first time you log into the ATA Console you will be brought automatically to the **Domain connectivity settings** page to continue the configuration and the deployment of the ATA Gateways.
trans-unit.target: 第一次登录到您将会自动向返回 ATA 控制台 **域连接设置** 页后，可以继续配置和部署的 ATA 网关。

trans-unit.source: Review the error file in the **Microsoft.Tri.Center-Errors.log** file which can be found in the following default location: %programfiles%\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center\Logs.
trans-unit.target: 查看中的错误文件 **Microsoft.Tri.Center Errors.log** 文件，可以在以下默认位置中找到 ︰ %programfiles%\Microsoft 高级威胁 Analytics\Center\Logs。

trans-unit.source: Step 2.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 2。

trans-unit.source: Configure ATA Gateway domain connectivity settings
trans-unit.target: 配置 ATA 网关域的连接设置

trans-unit.source: The settings in the domain connectivity settings section apply to all ATA Gateways managed by the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: 在域连接设置部分中的设置适用于所有 ATA 网关管理的数据中心。

trans-unit.source: To configure the Domain connectivity settings perform the following on the ATA Center server.
trans-unit.target: 若要将域配置为连接设置 ATA 中心服务器上执行以下步骤。

trans-unit.source: Open the ATA Console and log in.
trans-unit.target: 打开 ATA 控制台并以用户身份登录。

trans-unit.source: For instructions see [Working with the ATA Console](./small.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关说明，请参阅 [使用 ATA 控制台](./small.md)。

trans-unit.source: The first time you log into the ATA Console after the ATA Center has been installed, you will automatically be taken to the ATA Gateways configuration page.
trans-unit.target: 第一次后 ATA Center 已安装，请登录到 ATA Console 您将自动进入 ATA 网关配置页。

trans-unit.source: If you need to modify any of the settings afterwards, click the Settings icon and select **Configuration**.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要修改任何设置之后，单击设置图标并选择 **配置**。

trans-unit.source: On the **Gateways** page, click on **Domain connectivity settings**, enter the following information and click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: 在 **网关** 页上，单击 **域连接设置**, ，输入以下信息，请单击 **保存**。

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: Comments
trans-unit.target: 注释

trans-unit.source: **Username** (required)
trans-unit.target: **用户名** （必需）

trans-unit.source: Enter the read-only user name, for example: **user1**.
trans-unit.target: 输入的只读的用户名，例如 ︰ **user1**。

trans-unit.source: **Password** (required)
trans-unit.target: **密码** （必需）

trans-unit.source: Enter the password for the read-only user, for example: **Pencil1**.
trans-unit.target: 密码为只读的用户输入，例如 ︰ **Pencil1**。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** Make sure this password is correct.
trans-unit.target: **注意 ︰** 请确保该密码是否正确。

trans-unit.source: If you save the wrong password, the ATA Service will stop running on the ATA Gateway servers.
trans-unit.target: 如果保存了错误的密码，ATA 服务将停止 ATA 网关服务器上运行。

trans-unit.source: **Domain** (required)
Enter the domain for the read-only user, for example, **contoso.com**.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于只读的用户，输入域 **contoso.com**。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** It is important that you enter the complete FQDN of the domain where the user is located.
trans-unit.target: **注意 ︰** 很重要，输入用户所在的域的完整的 FQDN。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user’s account is in domain corp.contoso.com, you need to enter `corp.contoso.com` not contoso.com
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户的帐户是 corp.contoso.com 域中，您需要输入 `corp.contoso.com` 不 contoso.com

trans-unit.source: Step 3.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 3。

trans-unit.source: Download the ATA Gateway setup package
trans-unit.target: 下载 ATA 网关安装包

trans-unit.source: After configuring the domain connectivity settings you can download the ATA Gateway setup package.
trans-unit.target: 在配置域连接设置之后，您可以下载 ATA 网关安装程序包。

trans-unit.source: To download the ATA Gateway package:
trans-unit.target: 若要下载 ATA 网关数据包 ︰

trans-unit.source: On the ATA Gateway machine, open a browser and enter the IP address you configured in the ATA Center for the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: 在 ATA 网关计算机上，打开浏览器并输入为 ATA 控制台的 ATA 中心中配置的 IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: When the ATA Console opens, click on the settings icon and select **Configuration**.
trans-unit.target: 当 ATA 控制台打开后时，单击设置图标并选择 **配置**。

trans-unit.source: In the **ATA Gateways** tab, click **Download ATA Gateway Setup**.
trans-unit.target: 在 **ATA 网关** 选项卡上，单击 **下载 ATA 网关安装**。

trans-unit.source: Save the package locally.
trans-unit.target: 保存包本地。

trans-unit.source: The zip file includes the following:
trans-unit.target: Zip 文件包含下列内容 ︰

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway installer
trans-unit.target: ATA 网关安装程序

trans-unit.source: Configuration setting file with the required information to connect to the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: 具有连接到数据中心所需的信息的配置设置文件

trans-unit.source: Step 4.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 4。

trans-unit.source: Install the ATA Gateway
trans-unit.target: 安装数据网关

trans-unit.source: Before installing the ATA Gateway, validate that port mirroring is properly configured and that the ATA Gateway can see traffic to and from the domain controllers.
trans-unit.target: 在安装之前 ATA 网关，来验证正确配置端口镜像和 ATA 网关，可以看到从域控制器之间的流量。

trans-unit.source: See [Validate Port Mirroring](./small.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 [验证端口镜像](./small.md) 有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that [KB2919355](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2919355/) has been installed.
trans-unit.target: 请确保 [KB2919355](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2919355/) 是否已安装。

trans-unit.source: Run the following PowerShell cmdlet to check if the hotfix is installed:
trans-unit.target: 运行下面的 PowerShell cmdlet，以检查是否安装了修补程序 ︰

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps on the ATA Gateway server.
trans-unit.target: ATA 网关服务器上执行以下步骤。

trans-unit.source: Extract the files from the zip file.
trans-unit.target: 从 zip 文件中提取文件。

trans-unit.source: From an elevated command prompt, run Microsoft ATA Gateway Setup.exe and follow the setup wizard.
trans-unit.target: 从提升的命令提示符下，运行 Microsoft ATA 网关 Setup.exe，然后按照安装向导。

trans-unit.source: On the **Welcome** page, select your language and click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: 在 **欢迎** 页上，选择您的语言，请单击 **下一步**。

trans-unit.source: Under **ATA Gateway Configuration**, enter the following information based on your environment:
trans-unit.target: 在下 **ATA 网关配置**, ，输入以下信息根据您的环境 ︰

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Comments
trans-unit.target: 注释

trans-unit.source: Installation Path
trans-unit.target: 安装路径

trans-unit.source: This is the location where the ATA Gateway will be installed.
trans-unit.target: 这是 ATA 网关的安装位置。

trans-unit.source: By default this is %programfiles%\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Gateway
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，这是 %programfiles%\Microsoft 高级威胁 Analytics\Gateway

trans-unit.source: Leave the default value
trans-unit.target: 保留默认值

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway Service SSL certificate
trans-unit.target: ATA 网关服务 SSL 证书

trans-unit.source: This is the certificate that will be used by the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: 这是 ATA 网关将使用的证书。

trans-unit.source: Use a self-signed certificate for lab environments only.
trans-unit.target: 用于实验室环境仅使用自签名的证书。

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway Registration
trans-unit.target: ATA 网关注册

trans-unit.source: Enter the Username and Password of the ATA administrator.
trans-unit.target: 输入用户名和 ATA 管理员的密码。

trans-unit.source: For the ATA Gateway to register with the ATA Center, enter the user name and password of the user who installed the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: 对于 ATA 网关注册 ATA 中心，请输入用户名和密码的用户的安装 ATA 中心。

trans-unit.source: This user must be a member of one of the following local groups on the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: 此用户必须是某个 ATA 中心上的以下本地组的成员。

trans-unit.source: Administrators
trans-unit.target: 管理员

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Administrators
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 高级威胁分析管理员

trans-unit.source: **Note:** These credentials are used only for registration and are not stored in ATA.
trans-unit.target: **注意 ︰** 这些凭据仅用于注册并且不会存储在 ATA。

trans-unit.source: The following components are installed and configured during the installation of the ATA Gateway:
trans-unit.target: 安装和 ATA 网关在安装期间配置以下组件 ︰

trans-unit.source: Do not install KB 3047154 on a virtualization host.
trans-unit.target: 不要在虚拟化主机上安装 KB 3047154。

trans-unit.source: This may cause port mirroring to stop working properly.
trans-unit.target: 这可能导致端口镜像无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Do not install Message Analyzer, Wireshark, or other network capture software on the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: 不要在 ATA 网关上安装 Message Analyzer、 Wireshark 或其他网络捕获软件。

trans-unit.source: If you need to capture network traffic, install and use Microsoft Network Monitor 3.4.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要捕获网络流量，安装并使用 Microsoft 网络监视器 3.4。

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway service
trans-unit.target: ATA 网关服务

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Visual C++ 2013 Redistributable
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Visual c + + 2013 可再发行组件

trans-unit.source: Custom Performance Monitor data collection set
trans-unit.target: 自定义性能监视器数据收集组

trans-unit.source: After the installation completes, click **Launch** to open your browser and log in to the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: 安装完成后，单击 **启动** 打开您的浏览器并登录到 ATA 控制台中。

trans-unit.source: Step 5.
trans-unit.target: 第 5 步。

trans-unit.source: Configure the ATA Gateway settings
trans-unit.target: 配置 ATA 网关设置

trans-unit.source: After the ATA Gateway was installed, perform the following steps to configure the settings for the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: 安装数据网关后，执行以下步骤以配置 ATA 网关的设置。

trans-unit.source: On the ATA Gateway machine, in the ATA Console, click on the **Configuration** and select the **ATA Gateways** page.
trans-unit.target: 在 ATA 网关计算机上，在 ATA 控制台中，单击 **配置** ，然后选择 **ATA 网关** 页。

trans-unit.source: Enter the following information.
trans-unit.target: 输入以下信息。

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Comments
trans-unit.target: 注释

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Enter a description of the ATA Gateway (optional).
trans-unit.target: 输入 ATA 网关 （可选） 的说明。

trans-unit.source: **Domain controllers** (required)
trans-unit.target: **域控制器** （必需）

trans-unit.source: See below for additional information about the list of controllers.
trans-unit.target: 有关列表的控制器的其他信息，请参阅下文。

trans-unit.source: Enter the complete FQDN of your domain controller and click the plus sign to add it to the list.
trans-unit.target: 输入你的域控制器的完整的 FQDN，然后单击加号以将其添加到列表。

trans-unit.source: For example, **dc01.contoso.com**
trans-unit.target: 例如， **dc01.contoso.com**

trans-unit.source: The objects in the first domain controller in the list will sync via LDAP queries.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中的第一个域控制器中的对象将同步通过 LDAP 查询。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the size of the domain, this might take some time.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于域的大小，这可能需要一些时间。

trans-unit.source: Note:
trans-unit.target: 注意：

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the first domain controller is **not** read-only.
trans-unit.target: 请确保第一个域控制器是 **不** 只读的。

trans-unit.source: Read only domain controllers should be added only after the initial sync completes.
trans-unit.target: 读取只有只在初始同步完成后，才应该添加控制器的域。

trans-unit.source: **Capture Network adapters** (required)
trans-unit.target: **捕获网络适配器** （必需）

trans-unit.source: Select the network adapters that are connected to the switch that are configured as the destination mirror port to receive the domain controller traffic.
trans-unit.target: 选择的网络适配器连接到交换机配置为目标镜像端口以接收域控制器的通信。

trans-unit.source: Select the Capture network adapter.
trans-unit.target: 选择捕获网络适配器。

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: 单击 **保存**。

trans-unit.source: [!NOTE] It will take a few minutes for the ATA Gateway service to start the first time because it builds the cache of the network capture parsers used by the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: [!NOTE] 它将需要几分钟 ATA 网关服务来启动第一次，因为它生成的网络的高速缓存 ATA 网关用来捕获分析器。

trans-unit.source: The following information applies to the servers you enter in the **Domain Controllers** list.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息适用于在中输入的服务器 **域控制器** 列表。

trans-unit.source: The first domain controller in the list will be used by the ATA Gateway to sync the objects in the domain via LDAP queries.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中的第一个域控制器将由 ATA 网关，用于同步通过 LDAP 查询域中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the size of the domain, this might take some time.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于域的大小，这可能需要一些时间。

trans-unit.source: All domain controllers whose traffic is being monitored via port mirroring by the ATA Gateway must be listed in the **Domain Controllers** list.
trans-unit.target: 其流量是否正在由 ATA 网关通过端口镜像监视的所有域控制器必须都列在 **域控制器** 列表。

trans-unit.source: If a domain controller is not listed in the **Domain Controllers** list, detection of suspicious activities might not function as expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果域控制器未列在 **域控制器** 列表中，检测到可疑活动可能无法按预期运行。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the first domain controller is **not** a read-only domain controller (RODC).
trans-unit.target: 请确保第一个域控制器是 **不** 只读域控制器 (RODC)。

trans-unit.source: Read only domain controllers should be added only after the initial sync completes.
trans-unit.target: 读取只有只在初始同步完成后，才应该添加控制器的域。

trans-unit.source: At least one domain controller in the list be a global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的至少一个域控制器是全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: This will enable ATA to resolve computer and user objects in other domains in the forest.
trans-unit.target: 这将使 ATA 若要解决在林中其他域中的计算机和用户对象。

trans-unit.source: The configuration changes will be applied to the ATA Gateway on the next scheduled sync between the ATA Gateway and the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: 配置更改将应用于在下一步计划 ATA 网关和数据中心之间同步 ATA 网关。

trans-unit.source: Validate installation:
trans-unit.target: 验证安装 ︰

trans-unit.source: To validate that the ATA Gateway has been successfully deployed, check the following:
trans-unit.target: 要验证已成功部署 ATA 网关，请检查下列方面 ︰

trans-unit.source: Check that the Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Gateway service is running.
trans-unit.target: 检查 Microsoft 高级威胁分析网关服务正在运行。

trans-unit.source: After you have saved the ATA Gateway settings, it might take a few minutes for the service to start.
trans-unit.target: 在保存 ATA 网关设置后，可能需要几分钟时间以启动该服务。

trans-unit.source: If the service does not start, review the “Microsoft.Tri.Gateway-Errors.log” file located in the following default folder, “%programfiles%\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Gateway\Logs”, search for entries with “transfer” or “service start”.
trans-unit.target: 如果该服务未启动，请查看位于以下默认文件夹中的"Microsoft.Tri.Gateway Errors.log"文件"%programfiles%\Microsoft 高级威胁 Analytics\Gateway\Logs"，搜索与"传输"或"服务启动"的条目。

trans-unit.source: Check the following Microsoft ATA Gateway performance counters:
trans-unit.target: 检查下列 Microsoft ATA 网关的性能计数器 ︰

trans-unit.source: **NetworkListener Captured Messages / sec**: This counter tracks how many messages are being captured by the ATA per second.
trans-unit.target: **NetworkListener 捕获消息 / 秒**︰ 此计数器可跟踪每秒 ATA 正在捕获的消息数。

trans-unit.source: The value should be mid hundreds to thousands depending on the number of domain controllers being monitored and how busy each domain controller is.
trans-unit.target: 此值应 mid 数百到数千具体取决于被监视的域控制器的数量和每个域控制器有多忙。

trans-unit.source: Single or double digit values can indicate an issue with the port mirroring configuration.
trans-unit.target: 单引号或双引号的数字值与镜像配置的端口表明存在问题。

trans-unit.source: **EntityTransfer Activity Transfers/Sec**: This value should be in the range of a few hundred every few seconds.
trans-unit.target: **EntityTransfer 活动传输次数/秒**︰ 此值应为范围内的几百每隔几秒。

trans-unit.source: If this is the first ATA Gateway installed, after a few minutes, log into the ATA Console and open the notification pane by swiping the right side of the screen open.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是安装的第一个 ATA 网关，几分钟后登录到 ATA 控制台，并通过轻扫右侧的打开屏幕打开通知窗格。

trans-unit.source: You should see a list of **Entities Recently Learned** in the notification bar on the right side of the console.
trans-unit.target: 您应看到一份 **实体最近学习了** 控制台右侧的通知栏中。

trans-unit.source: To validate that the installation completed successfully:
trans-unit.target: 若要验证安装成功完成 ︰

trans-unit.source: In the console, search for something in the search bar, such as a user or a group on your domain.
trans-unit.target: 在控制台中，搜索的搜索栏，例如，用户或组在您的域中的某些内容。

trans-unit.source: Open Performance Monitor.
trans-unit.target: 打开性能监视器。

trans-unit.source: In the Performance tree, click on **Performance Monitor** and then click the plus icon to **Add a Counter**.
trans-unit.target: 在性能树中，单击 **性能监视器** ，然后单击加号图标到 **添加计数器**。

trans-unit.source: Expand **Microsoft ATA Gateway** and scroll down to **Network Listener Captured Messages per Second** and add it.
trans-unit.target: 展开 **Microsoft ATA 网关** 和向下滚动到 **每秒的网络侦听器捕获消息** 并将其添加。

trans-unit.source: Then, make sure you see activity on the graph.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保关系图上查看活动。

trans-unit.source: Step 6.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 6。

trans-unit.source: Configure short-term lease subnets and Honeytoken user
trans-unit.target: 配置短期租约子网和蜜标用户

trans-unit.source: Short-term lease subnets are subnets in which the IP address assignment changes very rapidly - within seconds or minutes.
trans-unit.target: 短期租约子网是子网中 IP 地址分配发生迅速更改-秒或几分钟内。

trans-unit.source: For example, IP addresses used for your VPNs and Wi-Fi IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: 例如，IP 地址用于您的 Vpn 和 Wi-fi IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: To enter the list of short-term lease subnets used in your organization, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要输入您的组织中使用的短期租约子网的列表，请按照下列步骤 ︰

trans-unit.source: From the ATA Console on the ATA Gateway machine, click on the settings icon and select **Configuration**.
trans-unit.target: 从 ATA 网关计算机上的 ATA 控制台中，单击设置图标并选择 **配置**。

trans-unit.source: Under **Detection**, enter the following for short-term lease subnets.
trans-unit.target: 在下 **检测**, ，输入以下内容的短期租约子网。

trans-unit.source: Enter the short-term lease subnets using slash notation format, for example: `192.168.0.0/24` and click the plus sign.
trans-unit.target: 输入短期租约使用子网斜线记数法格式，例如 ︰ `192.168.0.0/24` ，然后单击加号。

trans-unit.source: For the Honeytoken account SIDs, enter the SID for the user account that will have no network activity, and click the plus sign.
trans-unit.target: 蜜标帐户 Sid，请输入中将没有网络活动，然后单击加号可对用户帐户的 SID。

trans-unit.source: [!NOTE] To find the SID for a user, run the following Windows PowerShell cmdlet `Get-ADUser UserName`.
trans-unit.target: [!NOTE] 若要查找用户的 SID，请运行以下 Windows PowerShell cmdlet `Get-ADUser UserName`。

trans-unit.source: Configure exclusions: You can configure IP addresses to be excluded from specific suspicious activities.
trans-unit.target: 配置排除项 ︰ 您可以配置要从特定的可疑活动中排除的 IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: See [Working with ATA Detection Settings](./small.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 [使用 ATA 检测设置](./small.md) 有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: 单击 **保存**。

trans-unit.source: Congratulations, you have successfully deployed Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics!
trans-unit.target: 祝贺您，您已成功部署 Microsoft 高级威胁分析 ！

trans-unit.source: Check the attack time line to view detected suspicious activities and search for users or computers and view their profiles.
trans-unit.target: 检查攻击时间线，以查看检测到可疑活动和搜索用户或计算机以及查看他们的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Remember that it takes a minimum of three weeks for ATA to build behavioral profiles, so during the first three weeks you will not see any suspicious behavior activities.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，它采用对于 ATA 来建立行为的配置文件，以便在第一个三周期间您将看不到任何可疑行为的活动的第三周最少。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: [For support, check out our forum!](https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/security/en-US/home?forum=mata) [Configure Event Collection](./small.md) [ATA Prerequisites](./small.md)
trans-unit.target: [有关支持，请查看我们的论坛 ！](https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/security/en-US/home?forum=mata) [配置事件收集](./small.md) [ATA 系统必备组件](./small.md)
